aslib.security

Class FileHashCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • aslib.security.FileHashCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HashCalculator, java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileHashCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements HashCalculator, java.lang.Runnable

    Contains the functions to calculate the hash of some file.

    Since:
    6.1
    Version:
    2019-05-03
    Author:
    Adriano Siqueira
